changeSet.author: Yusikau Aliaksandr
changeSet.sql: create table telegram_order_log ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, order_type varchar(20), order_id int, old_status varchar(20), created datetime, new_status varchar(20), updated datetime, telegram_subscriber_id varchar(255), constraint telegram_subscriber_fk foreign key (telegram_subscriber_id) references telegram_subscriber(chat_id) );
